import React, { useRef, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { userContext } from "../../../Context/userProvider"; const Slide = ({ title }) => { const main = useRef(); const { pros: { proState }, } = useContext(userContext); useEffect(() => { console.log(main.current); }); const onLikeProduct = (e) => { e.currentTarget.classList.toggle("product-mark-liked"); }; return ( <>

{title}

{proState.lenght > 0 && proState.map((item) => (

{item.proName}

{handleNum(item.proPrize)} đ

{handleNum( Math.ceil( parseInt(item.proPrize) - (parseInt(item.proPrize) * parseInt( item.proPromo )) / 100 ) )} đ

{/* product-mark-liked */} Đã bán 34k
{item.proPromo}%

Yêu Thích

))}
); }; export default Slide;
